overview: Bo Reed and Wayne Darren star as a couple whose relationship is on the rocks after an infidelity. Though, unbeknownst to his partner, Wayne was fooling around with cutie Tory Bell at work, Bo is the one in the doghouse after Wayne arrives home early with a bouquet of roses, only to catch him in bed with another man (Shawn O’Toole). Tension persists until the two decide to start seeing gay marriage counselor Rolph Coral, who has some very stimulating hands-on techniques to revive a struggling romance. The only other complication is Rolph’s partner – who is none other than Shawn O’Toole!
title: Tricky Love
